name: Last-Of-Type
description: The `:last-of-type` pseudo-class is the opposite of [`:first-of-type`](https://css4-selectors.com/selector/css3/structural-pseudo-class/#first-of-type-class 'CSS3: Structural pseudo class') and is going to match the last element of the (optionally specified) type. It's also the same as `:nth-last-of-type(1)`.
example_description: This example code will select only the last `<span>` element of its parent element and give it a gray background.
